name: Robert Downey Jr.
comment: A very good router, My net speed has become much faster than before, Sadly I couldn't take the time of the offer so I had to pay the full price, The packaging was very good, anyway thanks TP-LINK .

name: Chris Evans
comment: Alhamdulillah got the right product within 4 days. Seller was responsive, packaging was also good. Thank you TP-Link and seller..

name: Mark Ruffalo
comment: Received in good condition . Looks intact. The packaging was satisfactory as well.It gets quite hot, but it is normal for a high-performance router like this. If it is a deal-breaker for you, this one may not be the ideal choice for you.

name: Chris Hemsworth
comment: Got exactly what I ordered. No hassles. Product quality is also brand new. Delivered within 5 days. Authentic product by authentic shop. I really recommend buying from this shop.

name: Scarlett Johansson
comment: Original TP-Link Archer C6(US) V3.2! Seller was responsive! Got it within 4 days only for 3067tk with Bkash Cashback! Will update my review after using for sometime! Hope it will perform well.

name: Jeremy Renner
comment: One word, brilliant! It's by far the best router you can afford. The best bang for buck as some might put it.The 'tether' app as well as the website does a great job at controlling the router the way would like it. 10/10 quality.

name: Paul Rudd
comment: My network is super smooth.....no data loss issues.....if you have a connection of fiber optic cables....you are good to go. check some reviews of the product you will get to know more

name: Benedict Cumberbatch
comment: Quality was as expected. Very good. But really disappointed with the packaging. The box was poorly packed and a bit damaged from outside. The product was delivered within 2 days.

name: Brie Larson
comment: Amazing so far, getting great Gigabit speed as expected and the range is way better than the WR series routers. Definitely recommended

name: Chris Pratt
comment: Excellent router finally. I changed 5-6 routers of range below three thousand . This is the best one I would say. Very good range. Solid internet performance. Delivery was very slow by the way.
